snippet: The Jets, who mustered little offense in a 34-0 loss to the 49ers on Sunday, have been hobbled by a serious left-foot injury to their top receiver, Santonio Holmes.
abstract: New York Jets wide receiver Santonio Holmes, who sustained a serious foot injury in team's loss to San Francisco 49ers, is likely to miss the remainder of the season.
lead_paragraph: The Jets, who mustered little offense in a 34-0 loss to the 49ers on Sunday, have been hobbled by a serious left-foot injury to their top receiver, Santonio Holmes.

headline.seo: Jets’ Santonio Holmes Is Probably Out for Season
headline.main: Jets’ Holmes Is Probably Out for Rest of Season
headline.print_headline: Jets’ Holmes Is Probably Out for Rest of Season
